Package org.hibernate.search.mapper.pojo.mapping.definition.programmatic

Interface PropertyMappingScaledNumberFieldOptionsStep

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PropertyMappingFieldOptionsStep<PropertyMappingScaledNumberFieldOptionsStep>, PropertyMappingNonFullTextFieldOptionsStep<PropertyMappingScaledNumberFieldOptionsStep>, PropertyMappingStandardFieldOptionsStep<PropertyMappingScaledNumberFieldOptionsStep>, PropertyMappingStep
    public interface PropertyMappingScaledNumberFieldOptionsStep
extends PropertyMappingNonFullTextFieldOptionsStep<PropertyMappingScaledNumberFieldOptionsStep>
    The step in a property-to-index-field mapping where optional parameters can be set, when the index field is a "scaled number" field.
